title: How to Use Power Armor in Fallout 4

steps.headline: Locate a power armor suit.
steps.description: For most players, you'll end up stumbling into your own suit in Concord.

steps.headline: Locate a Fusion Core.
steps.description: Power armor in Fallout 4 runs entirely on fusion energy. Without a Fusion Core, they're pretty much useless. Fusion cores last 20 minutes (10 hours in game) each.

steps.headline: Apply the Fusion Core to the power armor suit.
Enter the suit.
steps.description: Simply press A/X a second time after inserting the Fusion Core to climb in.

steps.headline: Use the power armor HUD in place of your Pip-Boy.
steps.description: Switch out weapons, armor, and heal if necessary.

steps.headline: Press and hold A/X to exit the power armor.
steps.description: Leave it in a safe place when you are finished with it.

text: Locate a power armor suit. For most players, you'll end up stumbling into your own suit in Concord. Locate a Fusion Core. Power armor in Fallout 4 runs entirely on fusion energy. Without a Fusion Core, they're pretty much useless. Fusion cores last 20 minutes (10 hours in game) each. Apply the Fusion Core to the power armor suit. This will power it up. Enter the suit. Simply press A/X a second time after inserting the Fusion Core to climb in. Use the power armor HUD in place of your Pip-Boy. Switch out weapons, armor, and heal if necessary. Press and hold A/X to exit the power armor. Leave it in a safe place when you are finished with it.
